description:
A legendary sword for the worthy only, 
a non worthy would have trouble using such a blade
name: Excalibur

description: Entirely glass sword granted strength through the Arch Lich Diabalicos’ soul having been trapped inside. The Litch whispers soft reassurances and even softer temptations from the sword when not in use.
name: Vile Blood

description: Reforged and repurposed siege weapons used to break down fortified castle doors. The oversized blade has been wedged into a bastard sword hilt.
name: Iron

description: Ancient spear rumored to have shattered the truce between the twin kings of the Shimmering Vale. The shaft is wrapped in faded banners from both sides of the forgotten war.
name: Oathpiercer

description: Ancient and storied longsword passed across the world. Each time it has been damaged or defamed, another wielder has repaired it with a different metal of their homeland.
name: Tall Tale

description: Old well worn glaive of an arena fighter. Notches in the blades fuller mark exactly how many gladiators the slave who once wielded this bested in combat.
name: Gladiatorus

description: Forged in the year 202 out of the melted iron statue of the tyrant king Keilis. Despite its age and all it's battles, it still remains in pristine condition.
name: King Masher

description: Regal rapier used by Thin White Duke of a forgotten order. Similar to the other assigned blades of the Dukes regiment with the noticeable addition of an obsidian star on the hilt.
name: Holy Lashing Blade

description: Sharpened broken tooth of the last dragon, crafted as a signifier to the end of the Wyvern wars. When swung through the air it produces an audible roar.
name: Harbinger

description: Executioner's greatsword. Each wielder has engraved the records of their adventures down the middle of its blade.
name: Iron Legacy

description: Towering warhammer forged in protest by pacifist blacksmiths.Too heavy to swing effectively by most mortals, but revered as a symbol of restraint.
name: The Anvils Mercy

description: Dagger once used by a giant, is now broken down the middle. As ferocious in battle as it is heavy to carry.
name: Konros’ Little Blade

description: Broken sword once wielded by a famed assassin who only struck in complete silence. Said to hum softly when near someone who’s told a lie.
name: Echo Fang

description: Old Sword. Very Unimpressive. Hard to imagine anyone or anything being afraid of it.
name: Vorpel Blade
